name: Ruben Gallego
tweet_text: We all want to help small businesses bounce back from COVID. It‚Äôs about making sure our plan helps everyone who needs it- not just certain regions or members of certain banks. My door is open to any other leaders who have that same goal.

name: Ruben Gallego
tweet_text: All of these are reasons that we need a better system. That‚Äôs why I proposed sending money directly to small businesses with under 50 employees- so they can all get the help they need without being hurt by outside factors.

name: Ruben Gallego
tweet_text: Also, banks aren‚Äôt participating in PPP equally: banks with more small business lending aren‚Äôt giving out proportionate PPP funding. So, depending on your bank and its resources, factors outside your control could impact access to PPP.

name: Ruben Gallego
tweet_text: PPP funds aren‚Äôt being sent to the areas most impacted by COVID-19. The fraction of establishments getting PPP $$ is actually HIGHER in areas with fewer deaths and infections, and less social distancing.

tweet_text: TL/DR: Going to war with Iran is illegal. Going to war with Iran for Saudi Arabia is incredibly stupid. We need to strengthen ourselves for competition with China and outlasting Russia. This is in the American interest. A Trumpy war with Iran isn‚Äôt. (7/7)

name: Ruben Gallego
tweet_text: We can (and should) fight Iran in other ways. Sanction the hell out of them again. Pressure Europe to do the same. Enforce freedom of navigation in Hormuz. Use the intel community to leverage all of the above. All cheaper and more effective than war. (6/)

name: Ruben Gallego
tweet_text: Add this situation into the larger world context. We have a military that‚Äôs worn down from 2 decades of war, a Russia that caught us by surprise and a China that has grown into a behemoth. We need to hustle to meet those threats now. (5/)

name: Ruben Gallego
tweet_text: A war with Iran would be brutal. Americans would die, probably in large numbers. Iran could strike back anywhere, in Syria, Iraq, against Israel, or in Europe. War would be hard to contain (4/)
